Content: guys_ if youve ever lost your account or had it hacked_ how long did it take epic support to get it back to you?
because currently my account has been hacked and has a pending merge of 14 days until it merges to the hacker's account
just hoping epic support will get it back by then

currently_ i am able to access my epic account_ because when i click sign in on the epic website_ it automatically signs me into my hacked account that i have no idea what the password is for it. I keep unlinking their psn and google they linked to it_ and relinking my xbox account. i log on just to see they spent all of my vbucks_ and have set up an account merge. when i click cancel merge on the epic games website_ i get an error. i have contacted epic support and so far they have sent 2 emails asking for different details
does anyone know if epic will be able to revert the account merge if they dont get my account back to me before the merge?
im done for if they cant revert a merge
i cant get any kills on apex lol
idk_ i had 2fa on and they accessed my email and changed the pass on that too
luckily i got my email back
im guessing somebody used a cracking program to get access to my epic account and email?
honestly sucks though. seeing that 'MERGE PENDING_ 14D 13H' and knowing i cant cancel it scares me because epic may not get it back to me on time
i have my hacked account back
